file.name: spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
x-snyk-api-stability: experimental
info:
  title: api
  version: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: /api
    description: Example API
paths:
  /things:
    post:
      description: Create a new things
      operationId: createThings
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Created things successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: { $ref: '../../common.yaml#/schemas/ThingResponse' }
      requestBody:
        description: Thing to be created
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: { $ref: '../../common.yaml#/schemas/ThingAttributes' }
  /things/{thingsId}:
    get:
      description: Get an instance of things
      operationId: getThings
      parameters:
        - { $ref: '../../common.yaml#/parameters/ThingsId' }
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns an instance of things
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: { $ref: '../../common.yaml#/schemas/ThingResponse' }

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /things: post: operation "createThings": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: resolve "../../common.yaml#/schemas/ThingAttributes": find schema: external base "../../common.yaml" is not supported
